title: Kickoff 2016
text: The first meeting for 2016 where we'll be planning for year including future times and locations.

title: 5x5 Lightning SYSKA - March
text: 5 minute lightning talks on 5 different topics by 5 different presenters on stuff you should know about

title: Git/Github Intro
text: Interactive intro session for git/github use (bring a laptop)

text: Interactive session to get help on all those how do I... questions you might have (bring a laptop if you want)

title: SYSKA (Tom K) Handling Large data in R
text: An introduction to the data.table package and other approaches to large files

title: Intro to R
text: First session, in a series, covering the start of the software carpentry R programming materials
